Email Setup - PT100 Alarms
func:
/*
data[0] = PIN_ID
data[1] = Alarm Status
data[2] = PV
data[3] = Threshold Parameter
data[4] = Equipment ID

topic[0] = PLC_ID
topic[1] = CMD
topic[2] = Subject
topic[3] = Serial_ID
*/
var data = msg.payload.split(',')
var topic = msg.topic.split('/')

msg = {
    payload : "PT100 Alarm has been triggered.\n" +
    "Equipment ID[" + data[4] + "]\n" + 
    "PT100 Sensor - AI[" + data[0] + "]\n" +
    "Alarm Status[" + data[1] +"]\n" +
    "Timestamp[" + Date().toString() + "]" + 
    "Site_BS001\n" +
    "AI Process Value[" + data[2] + "]\n" +
    "Threshold Parameter[" + data[3] + "]\n" + 
    "Equipment ID[" + data[4] + "]\n\n" +
    "PLC_Model[" + topic[0] + "]\n" + 
    "Command Header[" + topic[1] + "]\n" +
    "Command Subject[" + topic[2] + "]\n" +
    "Device Serial No.[" + topic[3] + "]\n\n" , // Body
    topic : "Alarm Notification | PT100 Sensor - AI[" + data[0] + "] | Status[" + data[1] +"] | " + "Timestamp[" + Date().toString() + "]", //Subject
    to : "monicon.sess@gmail.com",
    bcc : "monicon.sys@gmail.com"
};

return msg;

name: Email Setup - 4n20mA Alarms
func:
/*
data[0] = PIN_ID
data[1] = Alarm Status
data[2] = PV
data[3] = Threshold Parameter
data[4] = Equipment ID

topic[0] = PLC_ID
topic[1] = CMD
topic[2] = Subject
topic[3] = Serial_ID
*/
var data = msg.payload.split(',')
var topic = msg.topic.split('/')

msg = {
    payload : "4n20mA Alarm has been triggered.\n" +
    "Equipment ID[" + data[4] + "]\n" + 
    "PT100 Sensor - AI[" + data[0] + "]\n" +
    "Alarm Status[" + data[1] +"]\n" +
    "Timestamp[" + Date().toString() + "]" + 
    "Site_BS001\n" +
    "AI Process Value[" + data[2] + "]\n" +
    "Threshold Parameter[" + data[3] + "]\n" + 
    "Equipment ID[" + data[4] + "]\n\n" +
    "PLC_Model[" + topic[0] + "]\n" + 
    "Command Header[" + topic[1] + "]\n" +
    "Command Subject[" + topic[2] + "]\n" +
    "Device Serial No.[" + topic[3] + "]\n\n" , // Body
    topic : "Alarm Notification | 4n20mA Sensor - AI[" + data[0] + "] | Status[" + data[1] +"] | " + "Timestamp[" + Date().toString() + "]", //Subject
    to : "monicon.sess@gmail.com",
    bcc : "monicon.sys@gmail.com"
};

return msg;
